name: Finale - Madeon
description:
*Warning - This game may lag on some computers.*

A JSaB Fan - Level for the song "Finale" With an updated engine.

Re - make of this: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/283404500/

Controls - 

WASD To move

Space to dash

Avoid pink!

Bug fixes in this version -

Fixed broken hitboxes

Made dashing more smooth.
